item.description:
It's a sold out performance. I'll try to arrive early to wait in line, if possible. I'll wear a pink sweater and carry a fuschia paper flower. If you don't connect with us before going in, I'll wait for people after the performance. Let me know if you'd like to go out for dessert with us!

MET Simulcast in the comfort of a movie theatre -
Salome Opera ENCORE and then dinner afterwards.
10/22/2008

Wednesday, October 22, 2008 (7 PM Local Time performance time). Please arrive early. No intermission.

Karita Mattila caused a sensation when she sang Salome at the Met for the first time in 2004. She reprises her stunning interpretation of the part, including her unforgettable Dance of the Seven Veils; Mikko Franck conducts.

Casting subject to change
Running time is approximate
Fenway 13
201 Brookline Ave
617-424-6111
http://www.fathomeven...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll hv fuschia flwr in line. If I dont see u be4 I'll wait aftr performance.
item.name: Met Opera Simulcast at the Fenway 13 Cinema - Salome (Encore Performance)
